name: 吳聲昌
objective:
The course helps stdents to understand the knowledge of investment. It includes security. Future option and CAPM Models.
The market-leading undergraduate investments textbook, Essentials of Investments by Bodie, Kane, and Marcus, continues to evolve along with the changes in the financial markets yet remains organized around one basic theme—that security markets are nearly efficient
schedule:
Week 1		Chapter 1: Investments: Background and Issues
Week 2		Chapter 2: Asset Classes and Financial Instrument
Week 3		Chapter 3: Securities Markets
Week 4		Chapter 4: Mutual Funds and Other Investment Companies
Week 5		Chapter 5: Risk, Return, and the Historical Record
Week 6		Chapter 6: Efficient Diversification
Week 7		Chapter 7: Capital Asset Pricing and Arbitrage Pricing Theory
Week 8		Chapter 8: The Efficient Market Hypothesis
Week 9		midterm exam
Week 10		Chapter 9: Behavioral Finance and Technical Analysis
Week 11		Chapter 10: Bond Prices and Yields
Week 12		Chapter 11: Managing Bond Portfolios
Week 13		Chapter 12: Macroeconomic and Industry Analysis
Week 14		Chapter 13: Equity Valuation
Week 15		Chapter 14: Financial Statement Analysis
Week 16		Chapter 15: Options Markets
Week 17		Chapter 16: Option Valuation
Week 18		final exam
scorePolicy: Grade = normal grade (40%, class discussion + attendance rate) + midterm exam (30%) + final exam (30%)
